name: Emoji Invaders
description:
Pitch Emoji Invaders is a 2D game where you play as a battery-draining smartphone that must reach its charger before it runs dry. To get to the charger, use your grapple to catch and destroy the emojis so you don't lose more battery. But beware of the different interactions between the 4 emojis. Will you be able to reach the charging cradle before you run out of battery? Controls Mouse/Keyboard : - Use Z & S or W & S or up and down arrow keys to move - Use left clicks to catch and throw emojis Credits : Programming :

Virginie Nguyen

Franci Algera

Noé Guillaumin

Design :

Nathan Renaud

Thomas Monnerie

Artist :

Juliette Guillaumel
